jImage

Class Drawing

  • java.lang.Object
    • jImage.BaseImage
      • jImage.Image
        • jImage.Drawing

  • public class Drawing
extends Image
    Image with abilities to draw shapes and text.
    Author:
    Cy

      • scale

        public void scale(double scale)
        Scales Image based on scale ratio. Uses nearest neighbor scaling. Overide is to reset Graphics2D.
        Overrides:
        scale in class Image
        Parameters:
        scale - Scale of the new Image.

      • scale

        public void scale(double scale,
                  int hint)
        Scales Image based on the scale ratio. Overide is to reset Graphics2D.
        Overrides:
        scale in class Image
        Parameters:
        scale - Scale of the new Image.
        hint - Hint as to what type of scaling to use.

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)
        Resizes Image based on new width and height. Uses nearest neighbor scaling. Overide is to reset Graphics2D.
        Overrides:
        resize in class Image
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the new Image.
        height - Height of the new Image.

      • drawPolygon

        public void drawPolygon(int[] xPoints,
                        int[] yPoints)
        Draws a polygon with points from xPoints and yPoints. Will only use the number of points in the smallest list.
        Parameters:
        xPoints - array of x coordinates
        yPoints - array of y coordinates

      • fillPolygon

        public void fillPolygon(int[] xPoints,
                        int[] yPoints)
        Draws and fills a polygon with points from xPoints and yPoints. Will only use the number of points in the smallest list.
        Parameters:
        xPoints - array of x coordinates
        yPoints - array of y coordinates

      • drawArc

        public void drawArc(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    int startAngle,
                    int endAngle)
        Draws an elipse, but only draws from angle startAngle to endAngle.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of top left corner
        y - y coordinate of top left corner
        width - width of ellipse
        height - height of ellipse
        startAngle - angle in degrees to start drawing from
        endAngle - angle in degrees to stop drawing at

      • fillArc

        width - width of ellipse
        height - height of ellipse

        endAngle - angle in degrees to stop drawing at

                          int y,

                          int height,
                          int arcWidth,
                          int arcHeight)
        Draws a rectangle, but cuts the corners off based on an arc.

        y - y coordinate of top left corner
        width - width of rectangle
        height - height of rectangle
        arcWidth - angle in degrees to start cutting from
        arcHeight - angle in degrees to stop cutting at
